reviews.review_msg: Hard to work with him. He did not have any material ( no slide, no practice). His tests so difficult with true/false question (explain). I would like to avoid him if you want to pass or save your money. Gook luck!
Didn't like the fact that he doesn't use powerpoint, he is a tough grader too

Allan will respect you if you take the material seriously. I found him very willing to help with any material I had trouble understanding. His courses are structured to allow you time to learn the mindset behind economics  and make a few mistakes along the way, but still achieve a good final grade. Pay attention and tests are straightforward.
